faqs.question: How do you verify authenticity?
faqs.answer: We examine paper stock, printing methods, glass codes, capsule details, and cross-reference bottle numbers where possible.

faqs.question: Do you buy single bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, even a single bottle of DRC is highly valuable and we will purchase it.

faqs.question: Is La Tâche valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, La Tâche is a monopole of the domaine and is one of the most sought-after wines in the world.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Corton?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the Corton Grand Cru which was first released in the 2009 vintage.

faqs.question: What is the most expensive DRC?
faqs.answer: The Romanée-Conti bottling is the rarest and most expensive, followed by Montrachet and La Tâche.

faqs.question: Do you buy assortment cases?
faqs.answer: Yes, complete 12-bottle assortment cases are very desirable.
